resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104912</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104912</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>127493321</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Chimpanzee Problem Space</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schimpanse-Problem-Platz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Espace de Problème de Chimpanzé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Espaço Do Problema Do Chimpanzé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spazio Di Problema Dello Scimpanzè</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάστημα προβλήματος χιμπατζών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Espacio Del Problema Del Chimpancé</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This problem space will allow you to actively learn about chimpanzee conservation. The way it works: you aks your own questions; we give you tools to find credible answers; and then you share your results for future users of this website. </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Problemplatz erlaubt Ihnen, über 
Schimpanseerhaltung aktiv zu erlernen. Die Methode, die es 
funktioniert: Sie aks Ihre eigenen Fragen; wir geben Ihnen
Hilfsmittel zu den glaubwürdigen Antworten der Entdeckung; und 
dann teilen Sie Ihre Resultate für zukünftige Benutzer dieser Web 
site.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet espace de problème vous permettra de vous 
renseigner activement sur l'économie de chimpanzé. La voie que
cela fonctionne : vous aks vos propres questions ; nous 
vous donnons des outils aux réponses croyables de trouvaille ; 
et alors vous partagez vos résultats pour de futurs 
utilisateurs de ce site Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este espaço do problema permitirá que você 
aprenda ativamente sobre o conservation do chimpanzé. A maneira
que trabalha: você aks suas próprias perguntas; nós 
damos-lhe ferramentas às respostas credible do achado; e então
você compartilha de seus resultados para os usuários futuros deste 
Web site.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo spazio di problema permetterà che 
attivamente impariate circa conservazione dello scimpanzè. Il 
modo che funziona: voi aks le vostre proprie domande; vi 
diamo gli strumenti alle risposte credibili del ritrovamento; ed
allora ripartite i vostri risultati per gli utenti futuri di questo 
Web site.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάστημα προβλήματος θα επιτρέψει σε σας για 
να μάθει ενεργά για τη συντήρηση χιμπατζών. Ο τρόπος που 
λειτουργεί: εσείς aks οι ερωτήσεις σας  σας δίνουμε
τα εργαλεία για να βρούμε τις αξιόπιστες απαντήσεις  και 
έπειτα μοιράζεστε τα αποτελέσματά σας για τους μελλοντικούς 
χρήστες αυτού του ιστοχώρου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este espacio del problema permitirá que usted 
aprenda activamente sobre la conservación del chimpancé. La 
manera que trabaja: usted aks sus propias preguntas; le 
damos las herramientas a las respuestas creíbles del hallazgo; 
y entonces usted comparte sus resultados para los utilizadores 
futuros de este Web site.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>127493321</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Free to use or adapt with attribution to the authors for any educational purposes only</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104912</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/chimpanzee-problem-space</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
